mapper.update: update t_log set operation_method = #{operationMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_desc = #{operationDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parameter = #{parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_consuming = #{timeConsuming,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, error_log_msg = #{errorLogMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, operation_method, url, operation_desc, parameter, ip, time_consuming, operation_time, log_type, error_log_msg, operation_type, create_man from t_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, operation_method, url, operation_desc, parameter, ip, time_consuming, operation_time, log_type, error_log_msg, operation_type, create_man from t_log
